entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You paved the way for the recovery of some Rebel starships that the Empire had taken.
entries.journal_entry_description: Your assignment is to find out what the Empire has done with some starships they took hold of from the Rebel Alliance.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Listen in on a meeting between some Imperial officers. You'll find them somewhere in Bela Vistal.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Make your way to the Imperial Base at which the Rebel starships are being held. Disable their security and eliminate the guards to pave the way for the recovery team.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Take out some Stormtrooper guards. This will not only reduce the number of guards in the base, but will also sow some confusion and chaos.
entries.task04_item_name: The security terminal has been destroyed
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Destroy the security terminals in the Imperial Base so that the recovery team will not have to contend with automated defenses.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: ...and they'll be safe there. Think of it! We'll use those X-Wings in various illegal activities. Public opinion of the Rebel Alliance will plummet. And then...hey, who are you??!!
